title: 'Sofa is good but cushion is very bad which I have received'
'Cushion shape'
body: 'Poor cushions filling look very odd.it should be double fiber required'

title: 'Good product'
body: ADDING A BIT TO My REVIEW:  I bought the product for 8500 rupees and shockingly the price has been increased to 10500 rupees. This is outrageous.  The product is very good. It's very comfortable. 3 people can sit freely and 4 people can sit by adjusting. No damage found. Memory foam is good. 2 people with one child can sleep freely once converted in to bed. 3 pillows is a additional attraction. Will buy it again.
